Package com.intellij.openapi.ui

Interface InputValidatorEx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InputValidator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreateDirectoryOrPackageHandler, CreateFileAction.MyValidator, GitNewBranchNameValidator, HgBranchReferenceValidator, HgPatchReferenceValidator, HgReferenceValidator

    public interface InputValidatorEx
extends InputValidator
    Allows to display error text in an input dialog for input strings that do not match a certain condition.
